pre_caption: This video presents a stunning time-lapse scenery shot from the bow of a large container ship sailing on the open ocean at night. The most dramatic moment in the scene is a bright, greenish meteor streaking across the dark, cloudy sky. The vessel itself is loaded with shipping containers, and faint lights can be seen on the distant horizon.
